name: The Flavor of Time
flavorText: This garish amulet, once worn by an over large imp, makes time an insignificant thing.
flavorTextHtml: This garish amulet, once worn by an over large imp, makes time an insignificant thing.

primary.textHtml: Reduces cooldown of all skills by [5.0 - 8.0]%.
primary.text: Reduces cooldown of all skills by [5.0 - 8.0]%.

secondary.textHtml: Pylon effects last twice as long. (Emanates)
secondary.text: Pylon effects last twice as long. (Emanates)
